CREATE TABLE wp_emd_sessions ( session_id BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, session_key char(32) NOT NULL, session_value LONGTEXT NOT NULL, session_expiry BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (session_key), UNIQUE KEY session_id (session_id) )

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
